A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic Star Wars movie. The force is once again a powerful and mysterious power. The character development reminds you of the human emotions that dwell within even those with extra worldly powers. The visuals are out of this Galaxy and the sound effects are masterful. I spent the whole time smiling and inbawe of the great story that was told and left with thought provoking questions and anticipation for the next installment.
